sense.name: pay back what's owed to someone
sense.commentary: Note: Use: Pay back exactly what is owed.
sense.examples: I was repaid in full within the week. We will repay the loan. Do we have any debts to repay?

sense.name: reward somebody for effort, aid, or success
sense.commentary: Note: Use: Return a favor for something not necessarily owed.
sense.examples: You have visited my blog a few times recently and I've not repaid the visit! We can never repay your kindness. You hard work will be repaid with success. I will study diligently and conscientiously, and will repay you with my good grades. Thank you. I hope to repay you for your kindness.
